channel.title: Spongebob on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Spongebob on Game6r

item.title: Bikini Bottom Tic-Tac-Toe
item.description: Sea battle will help to have a good time and develop logical thinking. The game has two modes, and you can play alone or with a friend against each other. Moreover, in a single player game, you will have to fight not against a computer, but against a real player. But in this case, you will have to wait a bit until the computer finds an opponent for you.

item.title: game SpongeBob on the ship
item.description: Patrick gets on an ominous ship, where he needs to find SpongeBob. Move around the locations, collecting coins and exploring the most hidden corners. Sometimes ghosts will jump out of the darkness, they can be dealt with with a flashlight. But note that its charge is limited. However, it fills up quickly.

item.title: Nick Kingdoms
item.description: In this game you are invited to protect your possessions. Choose one of the four kingdoms and start defending it. Your task is to set up defensive towers so that they turn into an effective barrier to advancing enemies. But this requires money. At the beginning of the game you will already have a small amount, and then you can replenish it with a reward for the destroyed enemies.

item.title: Nickelodeon Cooking Contest
item.description: Imagine that SpongeBob got a job at a pizzeria. He is there all alone, and the clients are just like that. You need to help him serve everyone efficiently and on time. Carefully look at the order that the client makes. Then, very quickly, collect the necessary ingredients and click on the spatula - the pizza will go into the oven. If you make a mistake, throw the pizza in the trash.

item.title: Spongebob game - punch festival
item.description: What the inhabitants of the underwater world will not come up with in order to measure themselves with the size of their fists, the strength of blows and the strength of their heads. This time you, or rather your character, will take part in a fight that takes place on the principle of “every man for himself.” Four fighters (including yours) come out onto the court and beat each other up.

item.title: Spongebob game on TV show
item.description: On the eve of Valentine’s Day, the famous SpongeBob was invited to take part in a romantic television show. Help Mr. Square Pants to find out who sent him a beautiful Valentine. You will have to take part in several contests, for winning which you will receive prize points, thanks to which Bob will be able to recognize his secret admirer.

item.title: SpongeBob Goes on a Journey game
item.description: Playing on the field of magical jellyfish, SpongeBob and Patrick got caught in the net of a terrible fisherman. A nightmarish monster tied the heroes of the game to a log and left them to die in the sun. Fortunately, the kids managed to escape from captivity and now they have to get home to their beloved Bikini Bottom. Control the movements of the log to which your heroes are tied, try to deliver them home safe and sound.

item.title: Spongebob Sketch It, Guess It
item.description: The SpongeBob Squarepants game is very funny and is tied to the cartoon script only by the main character. The action takes place on land. Perhaps everything that happens to Bob in general is only a dream. In any case, according to the plot, he is a noble knight in armor and with a sword, who saves beautiful fish ladies, destroys all oncoming enemies and deftly overcomes obstacles.

item.title: SpongeBob SquarePants And The Saviours Of Slime
item.description: It’s time to go in search of SpongeBob’s pet, Gary the snail. Complete all game tasks in order to eventually reach the goal. You will definitely enjoy traveling through the underwater world of Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob will be very grateful for help in such a difficult task as finding a pet.
